bibl.title: Greek and Latin Inscriptions in the Brooklyn Museum.
bibl.seg: Herbert Kevin, Greek and Latin Inscriptions in the Brooklyn Museum. (Wilbour Monographs. IV.)

C.R. par Jean Bingen, ChrEg 46 (1971) No. 92, pp. 412-413. - Giovanni Geraci, Aegyptus 56 (1976) pp. 353-355. - J. Gwyn Griffiths, CR N.S., 26 (1976) pp. 109-110. - E.J.
